attributes.additional_details:
We are currently doing our GCSE citizenship coursework and have had to research what we would like to take action against. We decided child soldiers as children younger than us are being kidnapped and forced to become soldiers. This is something we feel strongly and passionate about as it is something that affects children and their lives. #ItCouldHaveBeenUs 
#ItCouldHaveBeenYou
attributes.background:
We are currently doing our GCSE citizenship coursework and have had to research what we would like to take action against. 
#ItCouldHaveBeenUs 
#ItCouldHaveBeenYou

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the UK Government to work with governments in other countries to take action to eradicate child soldiers.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
